scriptLines:
query: '<fetch version="1.0" mapping="logical" no-lock="false" distinct="true">
     <entity name="cog_donororder">
          <attribute name="cog_name"/>
          <attribute name="cog_donororderid"/>
          <attribute name="cog_contact"/>
          <attribute name="statuscode"/>
          <attribute name="cog_bankdetails"/>
          <attribute name="cog_competition"/>
          <attribute name="cog_paymentmethod"/>
          <attribute name="cog_paymenttype"/>
          <attribute name="cog_donororderfrom"/>
          <attribute name="cog_donationtype"/>
          <attribute name="cog_donortransaction"/>
          <attribute name="ownerid"/>
          <order attribute="cog_donationtype" descending="false"/>
          <attribute name="cog_totalticketamount"/>
          <attribute name="cog_donationamount"/>
          <filter type="and">
               <condition attribute="statuscode" operator="eq" value="181310001"/>
               <condition attribute="cog_competition" operator="eq" value="181310001"/>
               <condition attribute="cog_donororderfrom" operator="eq" value="181310000"/>
               <condition attribute="cog_bankdetails" operator="not-null"/>
               <filter type="or">
                    <condition attribute="cog_paymentmethod" operator="eq" value="181310001"/>
                    <condition attribute="cog_paymentmethod" operator="eq" value="181310003"/>
               </filter>
          </filter>
     </entity>
</fetch>',

query: '<fetch version="1.0" mapping="logical" no-lock="false" distinct="true">
     <entity name="cog_transaction">
          <attribute name="cog_transactionno"/>
          <attribute name="cog_contact"/>
          <attribute name="cog_transactionamount"/>
          <attribute name="statuscode"/>
          <attribute name="cog_paymentmethod"/>
          <order attribute="cog_transactionno" descending="true"/>
          <attribute name="cog_transactionid"/>
          <attribute name="cog_division"/>
          <attribute name="cog_bankdetails"/>
          <attribute name="cog_transactionfrom"/>     
          <attribute name="cog_transactiondate"/>     
          <filter type="and">
               <condition attribute="statuscode" operator="eq" value="1"/>
               <condition attribute="cog_transactionfrom" operator="eq" value="181310000"/>
               <condition attribute="cog_division" operator="eq" value="181310001"/>
               <condition attribute="cog_bankdetails" operator="not-null"/>
          </filter>
     </entity>
</fetch>',
